Trade/Device Name(s): CLEVER CHEK TD-4232 Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): CLEVER CHEK TD-4232 Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for CLEVER CHEK TD-4232 Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative measurement of glucose in whole blood using an electrochemical method.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from finger and alternative sites by people with diabetes or healthcare professionals at home or in healthcare settings; not for diagnosis or screening of diabetes.
